page.title: 03TOURISM - Caravans
page.content: TOURISM There are a hundred and twenty-four caravans at Rushy Hill Caravan Site. The larger caravans are more in the majority than the smaller ones. The larger caravans can go up to thirty-six feet and the smaller ones go up to twenty-one feet. There are all types of caravans all colours, sizes and shades. There are four buildings with toilets in. The caravan site is one hundred and fifty-two acres all together. The managers of the site have a house at the top of the caravan site. The site is divided into blocks and there are two washrooms in each block. There is one laundry with one washing machine and one tumble drier. There are also six basins in the laundry. Rushy Hill is a little smaller than the caravan site in Newhaven.
